pullrequest.title: Share vertices when loading a collada mesh, improve loader performance

content.raw:
The `box.dae` mesh used in the test only has vertices + normals, so it's only checking that the vertex should have different normals. But `cordless_drill.dae` has vertices + normals + UV's. So if we want to extend the test to use a `cordless_drill.dae`, we would need to check that it has different normals and texture coordinates: ie.

modify the check:

```
#!c++

EXPECT_TRUE(n != subMesh->GetNormal(k) 
```


to:


```
#!c++

EXPECT_TRUE(n != subMesh->GetNormal(k) && subMesh->GetTexCoord(j) != subMesh->GetTexCoord(k));
```

Unfortunately it was not possible to share the vertices in the `coordless_drill.dae` as each vertex has different a different UV
